content: Very well explained. People need to learn to respect other’s choices. And I don’t get why is that so hard at the first place? Until you have a kid, everybody is ready for moral policing, yet once the kid is there-’oh we told you parenting is difficult’! Sometimes I feel people poke you because it makes them uncomfortable to see someone else having the courage to speak out and act while they could not. As you said, it takes strength to be the odd one out.
